channel.title: Need help ASAP! plsplsssssss
channel.description:
Soooooo i have a small problem. i'm very new to the coding world and i'm just trying to learn. i've downloaded a (TEST) source and client and All the java/class/cgf files don't open.Even in the Client folder they alll ask me to open or pick a recommended program. they always ask me to pick a program or use a recommended program, i try and choose java but can't. i know i'm def doing something wrong, please don't flame like i said i'm just trying to learn. Any help would be much appreciated.
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2wexkro.jpg[/img]

item.title: Need help ASAP! plsplsssssss
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

xx pwns xx:

Urgh sorry… And How would i Open like classpaths and java files? Is it the same way with notepad or any other text editor?

You don’t open a classpath file.
Java files can be opened in a text editor. However, it’s recommended you use a IDE or some form of a rich-text editor like Notepad++.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help ASAP! plsplsssssss
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

First, you’re in the wrong section. This is server sided.

Second, you can right click the cfg files, and click “edit”. They will open just fine in notepad, or just about any text editor.

Read full topic
